headline: Assessing Northern Trust (NTRS) Valuation After Upward Earnings Revisions And Rising Momentum
summary: Recent analyst commentary on Northern Trust (NTRS) focuses on a series of upward earnings estimate revisions over the past two months, with no cuts. This has coincided with a strong momentum rating for the stock. See our latest analysis for Northern Trust. At a recent share price of US$146.38, Northern Trust has seen a 14.9% 90 day share price return and a 35.8% 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum has been building alongside earnings optimism and lower short interest. If...
